thread.title: Prince Harry's girlfriend Meghan Markle reveals she was once so poor she couldn't afford to fix her car
thread.title_full: Prince Harry's girlfriend Meghan Markle reveals she was once so poor she couldn't afford to fix her car

author: Natalie Evans
title: Prince Harry's girlfriend Meghan Markle reveals she was once so poor she couldn't afford to fix her car
text:
Prince Harry's girlfriend Meghan Markle reveals she was once so poor she couldn't afford to fix her car As a struggling actress, the Suits star drove a 'beat up, hand-me-down' from audition to audition Share Meghan Markle may be a star now but she was once a struggling actress (Photo: Getty) Share Get celebs   
She may now have bagged a prince, but Meghan Markle 's life as a struggling actress was more like that of a pauper. 
The Suits star has revealed she was once so strapped for cash she couldn't afford to fix her car. 
The 35-year-old used to drive a "beat up, hand-me-down Ford Explorer Sport" from audition to audition trying to get work. 
And she says she spent months climbing in and out through the boot after the doors jammed shut. Read More Is Meghan Markle planning to quit Suits so she can focus on relationship with Prince Harry? (Photo: USA Network) 
In an interview at the Create and Cultivate conference, Meghan said: "The clicker wouldn't open the front doors and I couldn't afford to fix this car and this was how I got from one audition to the other. 
"So what I would start to do is literally go to these auditions, park at the back of the parking lot and I would open my trunk… and crawl into the back of my car to the front seat to drive off to my next audition." 
In the interview from last October, which will be shown on Entertainment Tonight, the brunette beauty said she tied the car’s number plate to the bumper and was worried it sounded like a "steamboat engine". 
Meghan finally landed her big break in the smash-hit show, Suits, which saw her rocket to fame on both sides of the Atlantic. 
The bonkers reason Prince Harry won't be proposing to Meghan Markle any time soon Prince Harry (Photo: AFP) 
But the star is now rumoured to be QUITTING the show so she can spend more time with beau, Prince Harry. 
Meghan is said to be begging show bosses to have her character Rachel Zane written out, so she can spend more time in London, the Daily Star reported. 
Meghan, who has been a central character to the show since its inception in 2011, is said to want to make her home in London - meaning she must quit Toronto, where she lives to film suits. 
Mirror Celeb has contacted both representatives of Meghan and HRH for comment on the matter. 
The newspaper reports: "The sexy actress wants to quit legal drama Suits, which is filmed in Toronto." 
It goes on to add that the much-beloved couple "are set for a trial run" in the next few months as the Prince will be spending a lot of time in Toronto, in preparation for the next Invictus games. 
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle enjoy dinner date as TV star's friends say she has 'virtually moved in' with royal (Photo: PA) 
Harry is the founder of the games which are held for injured servicemen and women to compete in. 
This isn't the first time that rumours surrounding Meghan's future on the show have surfaced, following the news that she and the Prince had entered a relationship with in the tail-end of 2016. 
However, it was only in December that Suits creator Aaron Korsh responded to the question of a major cast member leaving the show with a firm "certainly not" in an interview with TV Line . 
Prince Harry 'isn't a fan of Donald Trump and fears he could be threat to human rights' (Photo: NBCUniversal) 
At this present time Meghan, Patrick J, Adams, Gabriel Macht, Sarah Rafferty, and Rick Hoffman are still all committed to their leading roles in the legal drama. 
Despite her rising star status in the industry, Meghan has seen focus fall firmly on her latest relationship, and it was only in February that she and Harry appeared to take things to the next level.
